name: GlobaChain Payment Gateway
description: I led development of the GlobaChain Merchant Payment Gateway, a platform that enables merchants to accept payments in cryptocurrencies.

name: GlobaChain On/Off-ramp Widget
description: I led development of the GlobaChain On/Off-ramp Widget, a platform that enables users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

name: TAAS
description: I worked on smart contract and frontend components of the TAAS dApp. TAAS is a decentralized platform for tokenizing RWA (Real World Assets), making it easy for anyone to create and manage tokenized assets.

name: Shiga Digital
description: I worked on frontend, wallet integration and backend components of a non-custodial wallet with on/off-ramp integrations, enabling users to buy, sell, and store cryptocurrencies.

name: Plotpeer
description: Developed frontend components and smart contract standards for tokenizing real estate assets on the blockchain. Led development of the Plotpeer platform, a decentralized marketplace for investing in tokenized real estate assets.

name: Mintero
description: Implemented responsive design for the Mintero landing page. Developed a proof of concept application for tokenizing real estate assets on the blockchain.

name: Duo Wallet
description: Collaborated with a product team to validate the concept of a next-gen wallet that prioritizes user experience and security. Developed the landing page and a proof of concept application.

name: Uwazi
description: Collaborated with a product team to research on and develop a solution for trust-less funding of wildlife conservation projects. Developed a prototype that won the 2022 Mara Hackathon.

name: TixHive
description: A platform that enables event organizers to create, manage, and sell NFT tickets for events. Developed frontend and backend/smart contract components.

name: African Valuables Collective
description: A platform that connects African creatives to the global market. Developed the landing page and a system for token-gating premium content.

name: SolSmurfs
description: An NFT project based on Smurf characters. Developed the landing page and a system for minting NFTs on Solana.
